lead_paragraph: Happy Shark Week everyone! If you missed the start of the Discovery Channel's annual series on Sunday night, this happy little anecdote about the making of "Jaws" from Peter Biskind's "Easy Riders, Raging Bulls" ought to put you in a great white mood. (It always works for us.)
snippet: A "Shark Week"-themed tale from the early filmmaking days of Steven Spielberg and George Lucas.

headline.main: May the Sharks Be With You

abstract: A "Shark Week"-themed tale from the early filmmaking days of Steven Spielberg and George Lucas.
